meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hilary Gaughen Aimee Seligstein Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6825.

td.p: Hilary Gaughen, a veterinary technician from Lakeside, California
Aimee Seligstein, a recruiter originally from Memphis, Tennessee
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 4-day cash winnings total $73,110)

tr.td: NBA NICKNAMES
ELEVATION DESTINATION
WORDS OF PAIN
RECENT HISTORY
PRODUCT DESIGN
PICK A NUMBER BETWEEN 5 & 477

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
